May 17, 1884 D Rochdale Contest (1800s)
Rochdale Contest (1800s) 0 Test Piece Contest
rochdale-contest-1800s
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Milnrow Road, Rochdale 1st annual contest promoted by the Platting Brass Band Prizes: £14, £8, £6, £4, £2 March contest 1st(£1) Kingston Mills. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 24, 2017, 11:04 p.m. Dec. 31, 2017, 3:09 p.m.
1 Heywood Borough Band William Wood 'Worthy is the Lamb' and "Amen" from The Messiah
2 Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen The Heavens are Telling [unknown arranger]
3 Kingston Mills Band Harry L. Holding Kyrie and Gloria from Haydn's 2nd Mass
4 Heptonstall Band Alexander Owen The Heavens are Telling [unknown arranger]
5 Farnworth Old James Clarke Wright
Withdrawn Hebden Bridge Band Unknown
Withdrawn Rochdale Old Unknown
